titleStmt.title: Curiosities in chymistry being new experiments and observations concerning the principles of natural bodies / written by a person of honour ; and published by his operator, H.G.
titleStmt.author: Person of honour.
Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.C. for Stafford Anson ...,

notesStmt.note: Ascribed by BM to Robert Boyle; not in Fulton.
An attempt to prove that water is "the only first material principle of natural bodies".
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
